edited_stories.edited_story_text: Last night we celebrated [Jan]'s birthday  party at the corner bar . All her friends and family were there . [John] bought a cake and everyone started singing happy birthday. We were having a great time chatting and taking pictures.   Everyone enjoyed themselves.The night came to a close with drinks and music.
